SELECT l.employeeId AS employeeId, l.leaveType AS leaveType, l.daysRequested AS daysRequested, l.startDate AS startDate, l.endDate AS endDate, l.address AS address, l.dateOfApplication AS dateOfApplication, l.dateOfApproval AS dateOfApproval, l.approverId AS approverId, r.reviewType AS reviewType, r.remarks AS remarks, e.firstName AS firstName, e.lastName AS lastName, e.email AS email, e.dateOfJoiningService AS dateOfJoiningService, e.leaveBalance AS leaveBalance, a.firstName as firstName, a.lastName as lastName
FROM leaves l INNER JOIN review r ON l.leaveId = r.leaveId INNER JOIN employee e ON l.employeeId = e.employeeId INNER JOIN approver a ON l.approverId = a.approverId WHERE l.leaveId =34

SELECT
l.employeeId AS employeeId, l.leaveType AS leaveType, l.daysRequested AS daysRequested, r.reviewType AS reviewType
FROM leaves l INNER JOIN review r ON l.leaveId = r.leaveId

SELECT l.leaveId AS leaveId, l.employeeId AS employeeId, l.leaveType AS leaveType, l.daysRequested AS daysRequested, l.startDate AS startDate, l.endDate AS endDate, l.address AS address, l.dateOfApplication AS dateOfApplication, l.status AS status, l.dateOfApproval AS dateOfApproval, l.approverId AS approverId, r.reviewType AS reviewType, r.remarks AS remarks, r.dateOfApproval AS dateOfApproval
FROM leaves l INNER JOIN review r ON l.leaveId = r.leaveId where l.employeeId= #{employeeId}

SELECT l.leaveId AS leaveId, l.employeeId AS employeeId, l.leaveType AS leaveType, l.daysRequested AS daysRequested, l.startDate AS startDate, l.endDate AS endDate, l.address AS address, l.dateOfApplication AS dateOfApplication, l.status AS status, l.dateOfApproval AS dateOfApproval, l.approverId AS approverId, r.reviewType AS reviewType, r.remarks AS remarks, r.dateOfApproval AS dateOfApproval
FROM leaves l INNER JOIN review r ON l.leaveId = r.leaveId where l.leaveId= #{leaveId}
SELECT * FROM leaves WHERE employeeId=#{employeeId} AND status=#{status}

SELECT l.leaveId AS leaveId, l.employeeId AS employeeId, l.leaveType AS leaveType, l.daysRequested AS daysRequested, l.startDate AS startDate, l.endDate AS endDate, l.address AS address, l.dateOfApplication AS dateOfApplication, l.status AS status, l.dateOfApproval AS dateOfApproval, l.approverId AS approverId, r.reviewType AS reviewType, r.remarks AS remarks, r.dateOfApproval AS dateOfApproval
FROM leaves l INNER JOIN review r ON l.leaveId = r.leaveId
